bug_report.ShortDiscription: The search in the dream book on the main page, using Russian words, does not work correctly
bug_report.Author: Fox Mulder

stepPlayback.stepPlayback: Open the main page of the site: http://www.ameno.ru
At the bottom of the page we find the section: DREAM BOOK
Enter a search word, for example "night"

bug_report.ExpectedResult: The search was successful, the description of the required sleep is shown correctly
